requirements.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
requirements.description: Support for MFA via authenticator apps, hardware tokens, and/or SMS

requirements.title: Data Encryption (in transit & at rest)
requirements.description: AES-256 encryption for data in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest

requirements.title: Compliance Certifications
requirements.description: SOC2 Type II, ISO 27001, and GDPR compliance

requirements.title: Annual License Cost
requirements.description: Total cost of ownership for 100 users, per year

requirements.title: 24/7 Support Availability
requirements.description: Phone and email support available 24 hours, 7 days a week

requirements.title: Response Time SLA
requirements.description: First response to critical issues within 1 hour

requirements.title: Training & Onboarding
requirements.description: Comprehensive training program and dedicated onboarding support

responses_supplier_a.response_text: We support MFA via Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, and hardware FIDO2 tokens. SMS backup codes available.
All data encrypted with AES-256. TLS 1.3 for all in-transit communications. Encryption keys rotated quarterly.
SOC2 Type II certified. ISO 27001 certified. GDPR compliant with data residency options.
Average API response time 45ms, p95 response time 95ms across global CDN.
99.99% uptime SLA guaranteed. Redundant data centers across 3 regions. Automatic failover.
Horizontal auto-scaling. Tested to handle 500x load increase. No performance degradation observed.
$150,000 per year for 100 users. Volume discounts available at 500+ users.
24/7 phone and email support. Average wait time 5 minutes. Multiple support channels.
Critical issues: 30-minute first response time. High priority: 2 hours. Standard: 8 hours.
Comprehensive 5-day onboarding program. Dedicated account manager. Quarterly business reviews.

responses_supplier_b.response_text: MFA available via Google Authenticator and SMS only. Hardware tokens not supported.
Data encrypted with AES-128. TLS 1.2 for communications. Encryption keys rotated annually.
SOC2 Type I in progress. ISO 27001 pending. GDPR compliant.
Average API response time 150ms. p95 response time 250ms.
99.9% uptime SLA. Single data center with backup. Some downtime during maintenance windows.
Basic auto-scaling. Tested to handle 50x load increase. Performance degradation above that.
$80,000 per year for 100 users. No volume discounts.
Business hours support only (9am-5pm EST). Email support available 24/7 with delayed response.
Critical issues: 4-hour first response time during business hours only.
Basic documentation and 2-day onboarding. No dedicated support.

responses_supplier_c.response_text: MFA supported via Google Authenticator and Okta. FIDO2 tokens supported. Yubikey compatible.
AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for in-transit. Customer-managed keys available.
SOC2 Type II certified. ISO 27001 certified. GDPR compliant with EU data residency.
Average API response time 60ms, p95 response time 100ms. Geographic load balancing.
99.95% uptime SLA. Dual region redundancy. Automatic failover with <1 minute recovery.
Elastic auto-scaling. Designed for 200x load increase. Tested under extreme load conditions.
$120,000 per year for 100 users. Volume discounts starting at 250 users.
24/7 phone, email, and chat support. Average response time 10 minutes.
Critical: 1-hour first response. High: 4 hours. Standard: 8 hours. 99% SLA achievement.
3-day comprehensive onboarding program. Dedicated account manager. Annual training updates.
